lead_paragraph: Milwaukee Manager Craig Counsell said Braun would shift back to left field, where he has played six seasons. Domingo Santana is in line to play in right.

headline.print_headline: Braun Is Headed to Old Spot, Making Room in Right Field
headline.main: Brewers’ Ryan Braun Is Headed to Old Spot, Making Room in Right

snippet: Milwaukee Manager Craig Counsell said Braun would shift back to left field, where he has played six seasons. Domingo Santana is in line to play in right.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Milwaukee Brewers' Ryan Braun will shift back from right field to left field in order to make room for Domingo Santana; other MLB news noted.
